title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Join our AI research team as a Machine Learning Engineer to build and deploy state-of-the-art AI models. You will be responsible for researching new algorithms, training large-scale models, and optimizing them for real-time inference. Your work will involve areas such as Natural Language Processing (NLP), Computer Vision, or Recommendation Systems. We require strong proficiency in deep learning frameworks like PyTorch or TensorFlow, experience with distributed training techniques, and a solid understanding of software engineering principles. The ideal candidate has experience with model quantization, pruning, and deploying models to cloud or edge devices.
